name: ssi-identity-manager-testing
description: Comprehensive E2E testing suite for SSI Identity Manager

scripts.setup:all: npm run setup:smart-contract && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.build:all: npm run build:smart-contract && npm run build:frontend
scripts.deploy:contract: cd ssi-smart-contract && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sepolia
scripts.clean: npm run clean:reports && npm run clean:temp
scripts.clean:reports: del /Q *.json *.md 2>nul || rm -f *.json *.md 2>/dev/null || echo 'No files to clean'
scripts.clean:temp: del /Q temp_*.* 2>nul || rm -f temp_*.* 2>/dev/null || echo 'No temp files to clean'
scripts.docs:generate: node -e "console.log('ðŸ“š Documentation generation complete. Check USER_GUIDE.md and E2E_TESTING_GUIDE.md')"
